title: Drawing, Design for Rectangular Dining Table on Octagonal Base, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Rectangular Dining Table on Octagonal Base
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite and pen and black ink, lower right corner: #3 Dining Table; in graphite, lower right of image with arrow pointing to right foot: Brass
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular molded table top with dividing stretcher running across center, raised on fluted columnar support with molded triple band around bottom, sitting atop octagonal base terminating in 4 short splayed legs with brass feet on casters.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Rectangular Dining Table on Octagonal Base, 1900–05. Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-172
